regular_menu.name: The halal icon is displayed on in-person menu boards only. Online menus are unable to display the halal icon due to technical limitations prohibiting compliance with all aspects of the Canadian Food and Drug Regulations.
regular_menu.full_text: The halal icon is displayed on in-person menu boards only. Online menus are unable to display the halal icon due to technical limitations prohibiting compliance with all aspects of the Canadian Food and Drug Regulations.

regular_menu.name: Dining halls are dine-in only. Take-out containers are not permitted for use in the dining halls. For those requesting accommodation with allergy/other dietary needs please book an appointment with the Registered Dietitian or call 613-533-2953.
regular_menu.full_text: Dining halls are dine-in only. Take-out containers are not permitted for use in the dining halls. For those requesting accommodation with allergy/other dietary needs please book an appointment with the Registered Dietitian or call 613-533-2953.
